mapper.select: SELECT s.item_id, s.item_name, s.item_price, s.item_stock, s.item_description, s.reg_date, s.admin_no, m.member_delete, s.item_delete FROM tbmall_stuff s JOIN tbmall_admin a ON s.admin_no = a.admin_no JOIN tbmall_member m ON a.member_no = m.member_no WHERE (m.member_delete = 0 OR m.member_delete IS NULL) AND (s.item_delete = 0 OR s.item_delete IS NULL) ORDER BY s.item_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbmall_stuff ( item_name, item_price, item_stock, item_description, admin_no ) VALUES ( #{item_name}, #{item_price}, #{item_stock}, #{item_description}, #{admin_no} )
